item.text: So what is an SPV Client? - [http://bitcoin.stackexchange.com/questions/4649/what-is-an-spv-client stackexchange.com]
SPV stand for [[Simplfied Payment Verification]]. So it's a [[Light Client]].

A Bitcoin implementation that does not verify everything, but instead relies on either connecting to a trusted node, or puts its faith in high difficulty as a proxy for proof of validity. BitCoinJ is an implementation of this mode.
Examples of SPV clients include MultiBit and Bitcoin Wallet for Android - [de.schildbach.wallet schildbach.wallet]
